page.title: 14INTERVIEW WITH MRS MARTIN
page.content: We visited Mrs Martin to ask her about the way the villages of Trispen and St Erme had changed since she came to live in the district.She has lived here for over 30 years. She could rember when the vicar lived in the rectory near the church.The present vicar is part of a team covering Probus, Ladock,Grampound Road and Grampound.He lives in the new estate which has been developed between the two villages and has made them one residential area.She does not think the estate has improved the district.She also wishes the people who have come to live in the area would join in with more of the local activities.Only a few have joined in with the many clubs and societies.
